text.p: In this lab exercise, you are tasked to complete the swapCards() method in the GameBoard class of the 1D array matching game. This method swaps two Card objects in the cards array of the GameBoard class.

ol.li: Swap the two Card objects in the cards array. The array indices of the two Card objects are specified in the parameters of the method.
Notice that you will have to swap two Card objects instead of their internal values.
With a correct implementation of the method, the cards should be positioned differently from the last game played.
